Assignment: Design Patterns Implementation

This project implements the following design patterns:
- Factory Pattern
- Observer Pattern
- Strategy Pattern
- Singleton Pattern

The implementation demonstrates understanding of software design principles
and best practices for object-oriented programming.

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/johndoe/design-patterns
